author: Jeffery Martin
title: Colorado County Challenges Governor's 'Safer at Home' Plan by Releasing Contradictory 'Safer at Work' Guidelines
description: "At the end of the day," Freeman said Thursday, "all we're doing is putting guidelines out. We're not telling businesses they have to open or anything like that."
content: Weld County, Colorado commissioners have released a set of guidelines called "Safer at Work" that are designed to help any business within the county that chooses to open its doors do so safely. However, the county's guidelines contradict the state of Colorad… [+3472 chars]
